articles.description: While Adidas is ending the federal court case, a messy legal fight over its split with the embattled rapper is just beginning.
articles.content: After a whirlwind week of litigation, Adidas has abruptly dropped a federal court case aimed at freezing $75 million held by Kanye Wests Yeezy brand, saying it will instead pursue the money solely th… [+4178 chars]
